text: Kamoo teng ba tlang ho hoelehetsa: “Mong`a rona! Re lopolle; re tla etsa toka, re lese bobe boo re neng re tloaetse ho bo etsa.” –: “Ha Re’a lelefatsa bophelo ba lona lefats’eng ho lekana hore ea inahanang a inahanele? E bile mohlokomelisi o finyeletse ho lona. Joale, latsoang moputso oa liketso tsa lona, hobane baetsalibe ha ba na mothusi.”
